description:
Take this course if you're a content creator who wants to captivate a fan base! Use Conducttr to build and engage audiences across multiple platforms like social media, email, sms and more.

This 30 minute "quick start" guide will get you acquainted with the essentials via a fun tutorial.

You'll get a downloadable PDF workbook, digital assets such as images and mp3 file and a video walkthrough explaining how to create a fun SMS game.

Conducttr is a revolutionary transmedia storytelling tool that integrates storytelling, gaming and marketing automation into a powerful toolkit.
title: Conquer Conducttr -  a Quick Start Guide
